name: docker-compose-express-psql-sequelize-boilerplate
description: a boilerplate app for a docker-compose app with an express and postgres container. The express server connects to the postgres container using sequelize

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run build:dev" "cd back-end && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml up"
scripts.start: cd back-end && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
scripts.install: cd back-end && npm i && cd ../front-end && npm i
